285    /**
286     *  <ul>
287     *   <li>For a Cart with <code>Platform</code> TaxMode, the <code>taxRate</code> of Custom Line Items is set automatically once a shipping address is set. The rate is based on the TaxCategory that applies for the shipping address.</li>
288     *   <li>For a Cart with <code>External</code> TaxMode, the <code>taxRate</code> of Custom Line Items can be set using ExternalTaxRateDraft.</li>
289     *  </ul>

576    /**
577     * builds CustomLineItem with checking for non-null required values
578     * @return CustomLineItem
579     */
580    public CustomLineItem build() {
581        Objects.requireNonNull(id, CustomLineItem.class + ": id is missing");
582        Objects.requireNonNull(name, CustomLineItem.class + ": name is missing");
583        Objects.requireNonNull(money, CustomLineItem.class + ": money is missing");
584        Objects.requireNonNull(totalPrice, CustomLineItem.class + ": totalPrice is missing");
585        Objects.requireNonNull(slug, CustomLineItem.class + ": slug is missing");
586        Objects.requireNonNull(quantity, CustomLineItem.class + ": quantity is missing");
587        Objects.requireNonNull(state, CustomLineItem.class + ": state is missing");
588        Objects.requireNonNull(discountedPricePerQuantity,
589            CustomLineItem.class + ": discountedPricePerQuantity is missing");
590        Objects.requireNonNull(priceMode, CustomLineItem.class + ": priceMode is missing");
591        return new CustomLineItemImpl(id, name, money, taxedPrice, totalPrice, slug, quantity, state, taxCategory,
592            taxRate, discountedPricePerQuantity, custom, shippingDetails, priceMode);
593    }

612    /**
613     * create builder for CustomLineItem instance
614     * @param template instance with prefilled values for the builder
615     * @return builder
616     */
617    public static CustomLineItemBuilder of(final CustomLineItem template) {
618        CustomLineItemBuilder builder = new CustomLineItemBuilder();
619        builder.id = template.getId();
620        builder.name = template.getName();
621        builder.money = template.getMoney();
622        builder.taxedPrice = template.getTaxedPrice();
623        builder.totalPrice = template.getTotalPrice();
624        builder.slug = template.getSlug();
625        builder.quantity = template.getQuantity();
626        builder.state = template.getState();
627        builder.taxCategory = template.getTaxCategory();
628        builder.taxRate = template.getTaxRate();
629        builder.discountedPricePerQuantity = template.getDiscountedPricePerQuantity();
630        builder.custom = template.getCustom();
631        builder.shippingDetails = template.getShippingDetails();
632        builder.priceMode = template.getPriceMode();
633        return builder;
634    }
